Description:
Slash so quickly that it extends the reach of your blade up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font>. This strike deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Slash.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and applies a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font>
 that will deal an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Bleed_DOT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% </font>weapon damage per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Bleed_DOT.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to 3 times and refreshes previous applications.)</font>

When applying the first <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font> stack to an opponent, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod1.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

If you hit only <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1</font> target, even on a blocked hit, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod2.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Increases initial hit damage from Tondo by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod3.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> if you are at least <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Slash_Mod3.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away from your target.

Enter a posed stance and unleash a series of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5</font> quick thrust attacks with each strike dealing more weapon damage starting at <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Flurry_Strike_1.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> and ending at <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Flurry_Strike_5.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font>. Flurry can be canceled at any time by dodging or by using another ability.
Each hit of Flurry does <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flurry_All_In.BlockDamage * 100]}%</font> more block damage.

Each hit of Flurry extends the rapier's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flurry_Weakness.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.)</font>
Each hit of Flurry reduces its cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">7%</font>.
The last hit of Flurry will cause the enemy to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stagger</font>.

Flourish performs an attack dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Flourish.DmgCoef * 100]}% </font> weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushing back</font> enemies. 

Pressing light attack at the end of Flourish will perform the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">follow up</font> attack, Finish. 

Finish lunges forward, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> and dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Finish.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> direct weapon damage and consumes all rapier bleeds on any target hit dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Ability_Rapier_Flourish.ConsumeTargetStatusEffectMult * 100]}%</font> of their damage immediately.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> 
 on both Flourish and Finish. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Finish_Stam_Mod2.Stamina]}</font> stamina when successfully hitting a target with Finish.

Each tick of damage from Tondo's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font> reduces the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flourish_Mod3.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Finish deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Flourish_Mod4.ConsumeTargetStatusEffectMult * 100]}%</font> of the rapier's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font> damage instead of only <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Ability_Rapier_Flourish.ConsumeTargetStatusEffectMult * 100]}%</font>.

Increase damage from both middle swipe attacks in the light attack chain by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier01.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font>.

Reduce all rapier cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier02.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> on any hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier02.NumberOfTrackedHits]} reductions per attack.)</font>

Any heavy attack on a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleeding</font> enemy will extend their rapier <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleeds</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier03.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier04.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to targets with a rapier <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font>.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier05.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage when your target has greater than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.PassiveRapier05.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Enter into a defensive stance for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1s</font>. If struck during this ability, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">counter</font> the attacker dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Riposte_Stun.DmgCoef * 100]}% </font> weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stunning</font> them for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Riposte_Stun.BaseDuration]}s</font>. You are briefly <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">invulnerable</font> upon a successful Riposte.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your rapier, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Riposte_Taunt.TauntDuration]}s to all foes within 5m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

If riposte successfully hits a target, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Riposte_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Riposte_Empower.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Reduce the cooldown of other rapier abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Riposte_Mod2.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> when landing a Riposte counter attack.

Increase the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stun</font> from Riposte to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Riposte_Stun_Enhanced.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Leave the ground lunging forward for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10m</font> in a stabbing motion and pierce through enemies dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Aerial_Lunge.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
Killing with this ability reduces its cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Aerial_Lunge_Mod1.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

After performing Fleche, your next critical strike within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Fleche_Backstab.BaseDuration]}s</font> will deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Aerial_Lunge_Mod2.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage.

Pressing light attack any time during Fleche will stop and perform a static, continuation attack dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.1H_Rapier_Wake.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> damage.

Perform a small, reliable sidestep in your current movement direction that cancels any current activity and provides momentary <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">invulnerability</font>. Light attacks made during Evade are performed exceptionally fast.

Individual successful light attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Evasion_Mod1.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> each.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evasion_Mod2.MoveSpeedMod* 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evasion_Mod2.BaseDuration]}s</font> after successfully evading through an enemy attack. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

Evading forward gains <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_Evasion_Mod3.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage on your next light attack. Ends on hit or after <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evade_Forward_Damage.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_Evasion_Mod1.Stamina]}</font> stamina after successfully evading through an enemy attack.
Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDMGMaxHP.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage when your health is full.
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusStamOnHit.Stamina]}</font> stamina on any hit.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusSpeedOnKill.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusSpeedOnKill.BaseDuration]}s</font> on rapier hits. Can stack up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusSpeedOnKill.StackMax]}</font> times. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDmgLowStamina.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage when your stamina is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDmgLowStamina.MyStaminaPercent]}%.</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDMGAfterAbility.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage on your next light or heavy attack after performing an ability. Ends on hit or after <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusDMGAfterAbility.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Critical strikes reduce all cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusCDOnCrit.cooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusCDOnCrit.NumberOfTrackedHits]} reductions per attack.)</font>
